channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: 2008: Introducing bit.ly — the incredible professional’s URL-shortener. A lot of people don't know this was my launch. Unfortunately the product didn't continue on the path I wanted for it.
item.source:markdown: 2008: Introducing [bit.ly](http://bit.ly) — the incredible professional’s URL-shortener. A lot of people don't know this was my launch. Unfortunately the product didn't continue on the path I wanted for it.

item.description: Tesla made “full self-driving” free for a month. Here’s one owner’s review. Not too far from my own, which I probably should write up.

item.description: Great map of Total Solar Eclipse of 2024 Apr 08. I've been looking for this for weeks. I still wasn't going to drive to see the eclipse. I've seen a total eclipse. Imho its not magical. We have an eclipse every night at sunset. YMMV of course.
item.source:markdown: Great map of Total Solar Eclipse of 2024 Apr 08\. I've been looking for this for weeks. I still wasn't going to drive to see the eclipse. I've seen a total eclipse. Imho its not magical. We have an eclipse every night at sunset. YMMV of course.

item.description: House Republicans Are Amplifying Russian Propaganda. (This is hardly news. All the polling they do, wouldn't their time be better spent focusing on facts today, and forget about magic thinking and polling.)

item.description: Ted Turner: I bet you’re all wondering what it feels like to be a billionaire. It’s disappointing really. I’ve learned that great wealth isn’t nearly as good as average sex.

item.description: I can't recall ever receiving spam as a result of subscribing to a podcast feed, and I have never gotten messages when I unsub begging me to come back.

item.description: I imported Molly White's OPML file into FeedLand, here's the resulting feed list. Tomorrow I'll get it to display as a blogroll. Interop is the best.
item.source:markdown: I imported Molly White's OPML file into FeedLand, here's the resulting feed list. Tomorrow I'll get it to display as a blogroll. Interop is the best.

item.description: Update: Molly White's blogroll does have an OPML file. I ❤️ interop.
item.source:markdown: Update: Molly White's blogroll *does* have an OPML file. I ❤️ interop.

item.description: Electric charging on NYS Thruway. I can't imagine it can handle the traffic to and from the eclipse over the next few days.
